meanings.definition: Of or relating to a continent.
meanings.sent1: The explorer studied the continental drift theory.
meanings.sent2: The teacher showed a map of the continental United States.
meanings.sent3: The continental breakfast was so big, it could feed an army!
meanings.sent4: Her love for travel was as vast as the continental landmasses.
meanings.sent5: The continental climate brought extreme temperatures to the region.

meanings.definition: A type of breakfast consisting of bread, butter, and jam.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the hotel served a delicious continental.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a light continental before starting her day.
meanings.sent3: The continental was so tasty, it felt like a treat.
meanings.sent4: The continental spread on the table looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the continental made her mouth water.

meanings.definition: A type of tire used on cars.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic recommended switching to continental for better grip.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the smooth ride with the new continental on his car.
meanings.sent3: The continental tire rolled away on its own, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The continental tire hugged the road like a long-lost friend.
meanings.sent5: The continental tire tread left marks on the pavement.
